feed.title: DockSTARTer Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.13.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Don't add a period after versions when showing them during ds -u by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1986

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.13.2...v2025.07.13.3

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.13.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix display of branch in the GUI during ds -u when there is no upda… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1987
  • Add logging when enabling and disabling apps. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1988
  • Change recommendation to use ds --status-disable instead of setting the ENABLED variable for depreciated apps. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1989
  • Add missing end quote in notice. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1990

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.13.3...v2025.07.13.4

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.13.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Use app_is_added and enable_app in appvars_create by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1991
  • Fix logic when deciding what to show when updating to the same branch by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1992

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.13.4...v2025.07.13.5

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.03.14-1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update Screenshots by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1993
  • Add crosssseed by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1994
  • Fix links in crossseed docs by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1995
  • Add vaultwarden, duplicating the config from bitwarden (which was… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1996
  • Depreciate bitrwarden (renamed to vaultwarden) by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1997
  • Fix vaultwarden by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1998

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.13.5...v2025.03.14-1

Edit: The release version on this is incorrect. It should have been v2025.07.14-1

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.14-2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Prompt for Stop, "Down" or "Cancel" when when stopping containers i… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1999
  • Fix ds -u command with no branch specified by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2000
  • Split update notice to two lines by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2001

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.03.14-1...v2025.07.14-2
